channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Digital artist Beeple put his face on a $100K robot dog next to Elon Musk and Picasso – it sold first
item.description: The project marks at least the second time Winkelmann has become the art world's main character.

item.title: Vimeo Promo Codes and Deals: Save Up to 40%
item.description: Enjoy 25% off a membership, 40% off, plus an additional 10% off annual plans, and more deals to save at Vimeo.

item.title: Sources: AI synthetic research startup Aaru raised a Series A at a $1B ‘headline’ valuation
item.description: The one-year-old startup, which does market research on simulated populations, had a multi-tier valuation round, sources tell TechCrunch.

item.title: The Best Deals From the Silk & Snow Cyber Week Sale (2025)
item.description: For a few more days, you can save on mattresses and bed frames from one of our favorite makers.

item.title: AWS needs you to believe in AI agents
item.description: AWS announced a wave of new AI agent tools at re:Invent 2025, but can Amazon actually catch up to the AI leaders? While the cloud giant is betting big...

item.title: Waymo to issue software recall over how robotaxis behave around school buses
item.description: The voluntary recall comes as scrutiny by federal regulators and local school district officials increases.

item.title: Buying Warner Bros. Gives Netflix What It’s Always Needed: An Identity
item.description: The $83 billion deal gives the streamer a century’s worth of prestige television and movies, from Batman movies to Game of Thrones. It also ends the s...

item.title: WIRED Roundup: DOGE Isn’t Dead, Facebook Dating Is Real, and Amazon’s AI Ambitions
item.description: In this episode of Uncanny Valley, we bring you the news of the week, then dive into how some DOGE operatives are still at work in the federal governm...

item.title: ‘Horses,’ the Most Controversial Game of the Year, Doesn’t Live Up to the Hype
item.description: First it was banned. Then its sales blew up. But Horses fails to meet the lofty goals of its own ideas.

item.title: Ex-Googler’s Yoodli triples valuation to $300M+ with AI built to assist, not replace, people
item.description: Yoodli counts Google, Snowflake, and Databricks among its customers.
